gov.ca.dsm2.input.parser
Class Parser

java.lang.Object
  gov.ca.dsm2.input.parser.Parser

public class Parser
extends java.lang.Object

Converts the text representation of tables into Tables containing the same information but easily retrievable in an in memory structure.

This is a one-to-one conversion and Tables to see how to convert this into a higher level structure that organizes the information in a closer representation of the objects in the model

Author:
nsandhu
See Also:
Tables

parseAndAddToModel

public void parseAndAddToModel(Tables tables,
                               java.io.InputStream inputStream)
                        throws java.io.IOException
Use this if tables are to be loaded from multiple files. Note: This does not merge tables named with the same name and is not supported. Use only to load distinct tables into the same model or handle that in a custom manner.

Parameters:
tables -
inputStream -
Throws:
java.io.IOException
